# ASAuthorizationSingleSignOnProvider

**Class**

A mechanism for generating requests to authenticate users with third-party providers.

## Declaration

```swift
class ASAuthorizationSingleSignOnProvider
```

## Creating an Authorization Provider

- **init(identityProvider:)**: Creates a single sign-on (SSO) authorization provider.

## Creating Authorization Requests

- **canPerformAuthorization**: A Boolean value that indicates if the provider is capable of performing authorization within a given configuration.
- **createRequest()**: Creates a single sign-on (SSO) authorization request.
- **ASAuthorizationSingleSignOnRequest**: An OpenID authorization request that provides single sign-on (SSO) functionality.
- **ASAuthorizationOpenIDRequest**: An OpenID authorization request.

## Identifying the Identity Provider

- **url**: The URL of the identity provider.

## Performing enterprise single sign-on

- **ASAuthorizationSingleSignOnCredential**: A credential that results from a successful single sign-on (SSO) authentication.
- **ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionAuthorizationRequestHandler**: An interface through which a single sign-on (SSO) authentication provider extension handles authentication requests.
- **ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionAuthorizationResult**: The result of an authorization request.
- **ASAuthorizationController.RequestOptions**: Options that modify how a controller performs authorization requests.

## Inherits From

- NSObject
